hero.subtitle: Software engineer with over 3 years of experience. Specialized in building web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js & Go.

experienceTitle: What have I been up to?

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Spearheaded the frontend of an AI-driven travel platform, building high-performance internal tooling and agent-facing dashboards using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, state management, and React Query.
Rebuilt UI components by replacing Material UI with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI, improving consistency, accessibility, and performance.
Implemented cron jobs to automate periodic processes.
Managed webhooks to integrate the platform with external CRMs, streamlining customer workflows.
Built backend features in Go with unit tests, boosting coverage and reducing production bugs.
Mentored junior developers and contributed to internal code quality standards through reviews.

experience.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Developed scalable, reusable component systems using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, successfully deployed across healthcare, gaming, and luxury retail projects.
Led the full rebuild of a mobile medical application into a web platform within 2 months, managing frontend architecture and implementation end-to-end.
Seamlessly integrated backend APIs and collaborated closely with designers for Figma prototypes.
Implemented Turborepo in Next.js projects, significantly improving project structure, developer experience, and scalability, resulting in a 60% reduction in build times.
Vite adoption for smaller projects without SEO requirements, enabling faster development, simpler architecture, and smaller bundle sizes.
Boosted accessibility scores by 30% through applying best practices and standards, utilizing Lighthouse and Ark UI for more inclusive user experiences.

experience.title: Front End Developer
responsibilities: Built UI components for statistical and user profile features using Angular, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, adapting layouts for mobile and desktop environments.
Designed and styled UI components with Tailwind CSS and Material UI, ensuring consistent alignment with product branding and visual identity.
Tested and integrated REST APIs using Postman, validating data from PostgreSQL-backed endpoints.
Documented processes, modules, and new features in Confluence for clear knowledge sharing.

volunteeringText.1: On 2020 I was volunteering for a year in Greece involved with the refugee crisis in Europe. Few weeks before covid pandemic started I moved to Samos, a small island in Greece 2km far from Turkey, the second island with the biggest refugee camp in Europe.
volunteeringText.2: With a refugee camp holding over 8.000 asylum seekers I started volunteering as a restaurant manager on a free restaurant for vulnerable people called Project Armonia. After 6 months, I started volunteering in Still I Rise, a non formal school as a logistics manager.

volunteerings.description: Manager of a social restaurant for vulnerable people living in the refugee camp of Samos, Greece
Logistics Manager of a non-formal school to provide education for unaccompanied minors living in the refugee camp of Samos, Greece
